wranglingProcedure: Download .maf file from TCGA DCC, processed into gene by sample matrix at UCSC, stored in the UCSC Xena repository
description: TCGA breast invasive carcinoma (BRCA) somatic mutation data. Sequencing data are generated on a IlluminaGA system. The calls are generated at Genome Institute at Washington University Sequencing Center using the WashU pipeline method.

wranglingProcedure: FIREHOSE data download from TCGA DCC, processed at UCSC into cgData repository
description: TCGA esophageal carcinoma (ESCA) thresholded gene-level copy number variation (CNV) estimated using the GISTIC2 method.

The dataset is combined from TCGA lung squamous cell carcinoma and lung adenocarcinoma datasets. TCGA lung cancer (LUNG) thresholded gene-level copy number variation (CNV) estimated using the GISTIC2 method.

The dataset is combined from TCGA lung squamous cell carcinoma and lung adenocarcinoma datasets. TCGA lung cancer (LUNG) somatic mutation data. Red (=1) indicates that a non-silent somatic mutation (nonsense, missense, frame-shif indels, splice site mutations, stop codon readthroughs) was identified in the protein coding region of a gene, or any mutation identified in a non-coding gene. White (=0) indicates that none of the above mutation calls were made in this gene for the specific sample.

The dataset is combined from TCGA lung squamous cell carcinoma and lung adenocarcinoma datasets. TCGA lung cancer (LUNG) somatic mutation data. Red (=1) indicates that a non-silent somatic mutation (nonsense, missense, frame-shif indels, splice site mutations, stop codon readthroughs) was identified in the protein coding region of a gene, or any mutation identified in a non-coding gene. White (=0) indicates that none of the above mutation calls were made in this gene for the specific sample.

wranglingProcedure: Download .maf file from TCGA DCC, processed into gene by sample matrix at UCSC, stored in the UCSC Xena repository
description: TCGA stomach adenocarcinoma (STAD) somatic mutation data. Sequencing data are generated on a IlluminaGA system. The calls are generated at Baylor College of Medicine Human Genome Sequencing Center using the Baylor pipeline method.
Putative copy-number calls on 1079 cases determined using GISTIC 2.0. Values: -2 = homozygous deletion; -1 = hemizygous deletion; 0 = neutral / no change; 1 = gain; 2 = high level amplification.
mRNA z-Scores (Agilent microarray) compared to the expression distribution of each gene tumors that are diploid for this gene.
mRNA z-Scores (RNA Seq V2 RSEM) compared to the expression distribution of each gene tumors that are diploid for this gene.
Methylation (HM27) beta-values for genes in 342 cases. For genes with multiple methylation probes, the probe most anti-correlated with expression.
Methylation (HM450) beta-values for genes in 833 cases. For genes with multiple methylation probes, the probe most anti-correlated with expression.
Mutation data from whole exome sequencing.
Binary mutation data from whole exome sequencing.
Protein or phosphoprotein level (Z-scores) measured by reverse phase protein array (RPPA)

Expression levels for 20532 genes in 541 hnsc cases (RNA Seq V2 RSEM).
Methylation (HM450) beta-values for genes in 580 cases. For genes with multiple methylation probes, the probe most anti-correlated with expression.
